name: nv_dynamic_boost
info:
Set the dynamic boost limit of the Nvidia dGPU:
	* min=5, max=25

name: throttle_thermal_policy
info:
Throttle thermal policy mode:
	* 0 - default,
	* 1 - overboost,
	* 2 - silent

name: fan_boost_mode
info:
Fan boost mode:
	* 0 - normal,
	* 1 - overboost,
	* 2 - silent
